last_quickloot: blue crystal shard, blue piece of cloth, giant shimmering pearl, green crystal shard, mycological bow, onyx chip, red piece of cloth, sacred tree amulet, small emerald, small enchanted amethyst, small enchanted emerald, springsprout rod, suspicious device, terra amulet, violet crystal shard
ingame_hotkeys:
local petBodies = {4126,4127}

macro(500, "Revive Pet", function()
  if not isInPz() then
    for i, tile in ipairs(g_map.getTiles(posz())) do
      for u, item in ipairs(tile:getItems()) do
        if table.find(petBodies, item:getId()) and findItem(34234) then
          useWith(34234, item)
        end
      end
    end
  end
end)
